UniprotID	P07093
Accession	P07093;B2R6A4;B4DIF2;Q53S15;Q5D0C4
EntryName	GDN_HUMAN
ProteinName	Glia-derived nexin (GDN) (Peptidase inhibitor 7) (PI-7) (Protease nexin 1) (PN-1) (Protease nexin I) (Serpin E2)
GeneName	SERPINE2 PI7 PN1
Length	398
Function	Serine protease inhibitor with activity toward thrombin, trypsin, and urokinase. Promotes neurite extension by inhibiting thrombin. Binds heparin.
Subcellular Location	Secreted; Extracellular space
